##mutate、summerise

```{r}



StuList <- list(
  次序=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8),
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517,833,752,114),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白","阿華","小英","阿美"),
  性別=c("男","男","男","女","女","男","女","男"),
  成績=c(80,42,90,82,50,77,30,90)
  )
StuList 
as.data.frame(StuList) -> StuDFfromList
StuDFfromList
StuDFfromList

StuDF <- data.frame(
  次序=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8),
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517,833,752,114),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白","阿華","小英","阿美"),
  性別=c("男","男","男","女","女","男","女","男"),
  成績=c(80,42,90,82,50,77,30,90)
  )
StuDF



summarise(StuDF,
          平均成績=mean(成績),
          最高分=max(成績),
          最低分=min(成績),
          )

mutate(StuDF,
      平均成績=mean(成績),
      最高分=max(成績),
      最低分=min(成績),
      
      調分後成績=成績+(最高分-最低分)/5,
          )  ->  StuDF

StuDF

```

```{r}

StuDF <- data.frame(
  次序=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8),

  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白","阿華","小英","阿美"),
  性別=c("男","男","男","女","女","男","女","男"),
  成績=c(80,42,90,82,50,77,30,90)
  )
StuDF
mutate(StuDF,
      平均成績=mean(成績),

StuDF
```

```{r}
library(readr)
collegeData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/103_student.csv")

collegeData


mutate(collegeData,男生=一年級男生+二年級男生+三年級男生+四年級男生)
->collegeData

collegeData$女生<-collegeData$一年級女生+collegeData$二年級女生+collegeData$三年級女生+collegeData$四年級女生
collegeData

mutate(collegeData,男女生比=男生/女生)->collegeData

collegeData
         
View(collegeData
     )
```




```{r}
StuDF
mutate(StuDF,調分後成績=成績+10)->StuDF   #記得回存
mutate(StuDF,調分後成績=成績+10)     
#從data frame 的角度增加欄位(dplyr下)
StuDF$調分後成績 <-  StuDF$成績+10      
#$ : 從list的角度多加一個元素叫做調分後成績
```




## logic、select

```{r}
StuDF2
mutate(StuDF2,
      調分後成績=成績+(max(成績)-min(成績))/5,) ->StuDF2
StuDF2

names(StuDF2) # 顯示物件內元素名稱
select(StuDF2,
       姓名,學號,成績,調分後成績)
select(StuDF2,
       -次序,-性別,-最高分,-最低分,-平均成績)





StuDF
mutate(StuDF,
      平均成績=mean(成績),
      調分後成績=成績+(max(成績)-min(成績))/5,
          )  ->  StuDF
StuDF


StuDF




# logical vector
logiChoose <- c(
  F,F,F,T,T,F,T,F   
  )

## logic


# 使用logical vector選擇所要觀測值"女"
StuDF[logiChoose,]




StuDF$性別=="女" # logical predicate

logiChoose <- StuDF$性別=="女"   #logichoose是一個判斷的向量
StuDF
logiChoose

StuDF[logiChoose,]        #logichoose為TURE是457,所以顯示出457的ROW
StuDF[logiChoose]         #logichoose為TURE是457,所以顯示出457的COLUMN


logiChoose
which(logiChoose)     # which:那些row本身是TURE

slice(
  StuDF,which(logiChoose)
)                        #slice函數本身選取ROW



StuDF2
StuDF2[1]   #column
StuDF2[1,]  #row
```
